author: AFP
title: Companies move jobs away from India as coronavirus shakes up back offices
description: Restrictions on normal activity in these countries have created a logistical nightmare for call centres.
content:
Coronavirus is permanently shaking up the global 
outsourcing industry 
as lockdowns from Bangalore to Manila prompt 
firms to "
reshore" jobs and, with 
AI, to move further away from needing humans at all.
Restrictions on normal activity in these count… [+4290 chars]
